items.title: Custom Workbench Build
items.description: Heavy-duty workbench with integrated tool storage and hardwood top. Features adjustable legs and modular vise system.

items.title: Leather Journal Cover
items.description: Hand-stitched leather cover for field journal. Vegetable-tanned leather with brass hardware and internal pockets.

items.title: Personal Website v2
items.description: Redesigned personal site with Classical theme. Features auto-updating stats, journal entries, and adventure logs.

items.title: CNC Router Frame
items.description: Aluminum extrusion frame for DIY CNC router. Designed for rigidity and precision with lead screw drive system.

items.title: Local Trail Maintenance Co-op
items.description: Community-funded trail maintenance service. Coordinating volunteers and establishing sustainable funding model.

items.title: Mineral Collection Catalog
items.description: Documented field collection of 200+ specimens. Includes location data, formation details, and photographs.

items.title: ESP32 Weather Station
items.description: Solar-powered remote weather station with WiFi connectivity. Monitors temperature, humidity, pressure, and wind.

items.title: Knife Forging Setup
items.description: Built gas forge and acquired anvil for blade smithing. Currently practicing basic stock removal and heat treating.

items.title: Large Format Film Photography
items.description: Exploring 4x5 view camera system for landscape work. Learning wet plate collodion process.

items.title: Hiking Meetup Group
items.description: Monthly group hikes for beginners and intermediates. Focus on skill-building and safety education.
